description: Frontend Developer, Skilled in JavaScript, Vue, Nuxt, CSS and Problem Solving.
aboutMe: Greetings! I'm Kai, a passionate web developer actively exploring new job opportunities. With a diverse range of projects under my belt, I have honed my skills in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue, Nuxt, C#, and SQL. I thrive on transforming creative ideas into functional and visually appealing web applications.
